title: The Sleeping Tiger (restored, colorized) (1954, film noir, imdb score: 6.5)

sources.title: The Sleeping Tiger (restored, colorized) (1954, film noir, imdb score: 6.5)
sources.description: The Sleeping Tiger is a 1954 British film noir directed by Joseph Losey and starring Alexis Smith , Dirk Bogarde and Alexander Knox . It was Losey's first British feature, which he directed under the pseudonym of Victor Hanbury due to being blacklisted in the McCarthy Era . It was shot at Walton Studios and on location in London . The film's sets were designed by the art director John Stoll . It was released by Anglo-Amalgamated while in America it was distributed by Astor Pictures .
